title: Index Fund Reflexivity
context: Index funds are the greatest financial innovation of the past 50 years. Jack Bogle's insight was simple: most active managers underperform the index after fees, so just buy the index. The data is overwhelming — over 20-year periods, 90%+ of active funds underperform their benchmark. Trillions of dollars have flowed from active to passive management. But index funds work because active managers do the work of price discovery. When passive ownership crosses a threshold — currently estimated at 40-50% of total market cap — the mechanism that makes index investing rational begins to break down. Stocks get bought and sold based on index membership, not fundamentals. Capital allocation becomes mechanical. Price signals that guide the economy become distorted. The strategy that works because others do the hard work of analysis stops working when nobody does the analysis anymore.
hypothesis: Passive index investing beats active management and is the optimal strategy for most investors.

chain.root: Massive shift from active to passive index investing

impact.metric: Passive share of US equity market

dontIf: You believe passive investing has no systemic risks because it's worked for the past 30 years
Your entire portfolio is in a single market-cap-weighted index fund with no diversification
ifYouMust: Diversify across index methodologies — equal-weight, factor-based, not just market-cap-weighted
Maintain some allocation to active managers who provide price discovery
Understand that index investing is a free-rider strategy that depends on others doing fundamental analysis
Rebalance on your own schedule, not on index rebalancing dates when everyone else is trading

alternatives.name: Equal-weight index funds
alternatives.note: Avoid market-cap concentration by weighting all stocks equally

alternatives.name: Factor-based investing
alternatives.note: Target value, quality, or momentum factors rather than pure market cap

alternatives.name: Direct indexing
alternatives.note: Own individual stocks in index proportions — enables tax-loss harvesting and customization
